summary: An ordinance providing for improvement of 4th Avenue South, from Spokane Street to Duwamish Avenue; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues; by filling, graveling, and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Resolution No. 9126 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment by Bonds".
